channel.title: Nolan's Treasure Trail Log
channel.description:
I am starting this thread to keep track of all my rewards and their dates. The first picture posted will be a result from my very first clue scroll opened on rs2007 and carry on accordingly. Wish me luck! :D
[5-10-2013] Clue Scroll #1 (Very first clue scroll ever opened on rs2007!) [img]http://i83.servimg.com/u/f83/16/16/97/89/111.png[/img]
